rice_blast.name: Blas Padi
rice_blast.description: Penyakit jamur ganas di padi. Bercak belah ketupat di daun, leher malai patah busuk.

rice_brown_spot.name: Bercak Coklat
rice_brown_spot.description: Tanda tanah kurang sehat. Bercak coklat oval di daun.

rice_bacterial_leaf_blight.name: Kresek
rice_bacterial_leaf_blight.description: Daun padi menguning dan kering dari pinggir. Parah saat musim hujan.

rice_tungro.name: Tungro
rice_tungro.description: Padi kerdil warna oranye. Disebabkan wereng hijau.

corn_downy_mildew.name: Bulai Jagung
corn_downy_mildew.description: Daun jagung putih bergaris. Tanaman kerdil tidak berbuah.

corn_leaf_blight.name: Hawar Daun
corn_leaf_blight.description: Bercak panjang abu-abu di daun jagung.

chili_anthracnose.name: Patek
chili_anthracnose.description: Buah cabai busuk berair, warna hitam atau oranye.

onion_purple_blotch.name: Bercak Ungu
onion_purple_blotch.description: Bercak ungu di daun bawang, daun patah.

onion_fusarium_basal_rot.name: Moler
onion_fusarium_basal_rot.description: Daun bawang melintir kuning, akar busuk.

onion_anthracnose.name: Otomatis
onion_anthracnose.description: Leher batang bawang busuk, mati cepat.
